mapper.insert: insert into spost(sno, stitle, sucode, swriter, sstartday, sendday, splace, salarm, scontent, senrolldate, sopen) values ( (select concat('s', (select nvl(max(to_number(substr(sno,2))),0)+1 from spost))from dual) , #{stitle}, #{sucode}, #{swriter}, #{sstartday}, #{sendday}, #{splace}, #{salarm}, #{scontent}, sysdate, #{sopen} )
